transcript:
Customer: Mahadev Mahadev.

Executive: Haan sir.

Executive: Haan ji sir namaskar, Aditya se baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, kaise hain sir?

Customer: Haan sir. Hello.

Executive: Sir kal aapki mujhse baat hui thi na? Haan ji sir, usi ke regarding maine call kiya tha ki maine kuch aapke na SCS mein kuch cheeze jo thi woh change matlab aapka jo account hai sir, usme kuch cheeze maine nayi daali thi, jaise kuch cheeze aapne missing ki thi, jaise photos jo the woh missing the sir. Woh maine kal increase ki thi aur kuch cheeze aur thi sir jisko increase karna tha. To uske liye mujhe aapse coordinate karna tha sir. Jaise kya hai na sir jaise ek score hota hai sir, theek hai? Isme aapka score karke hota hai maine na nayi nayi photos daali hai sir, jaise aapka dehydrated potato powder hai sir, theek hai? Fir aapka dry powder, dry potato powder hai. Yeh in sab mein na sir photos ki missing thi, theek hai? Aapke bahut saare aise products the jisme already tha lekin kuch kuch mein sir nahi the to usme maine increase kiya hai, theek hai? Usme maine aapke dehydrated ginger flakes karke jo hai sir usme bhi maine aapke photos ko daal rakha hai, theek hai? Sir ek cheez puchna tha jo packaging size hai sir woh kitna rahega sir? Woh order ke hisab se rahega ki aap apna kuch aisa rehta hai?

Customer: Packaging size?

Executive: Packaging size ji sir jaise 250 gram, 500 gram, 1 kg, 10 kg to kya rehta hai sir aapka?

Customer: Nahi woh to woh hamara to bada hi rehta hai yeh 1 kg se chalu hota hai.

Executive: To maine maine yaha pe likh diya according to order to sahi hai na sir matlab jis hisab se order us hisab se hum karte hain. Theek hai? Woh maine likh diya hai yaha pe aur jaise aapke na bahut saare score ki value woh kam the to maine usko increase kar diya hai taki kam se kam aapka account theek dikhe, theek hai? Do teen, do teen cheezon ko bach gaye hain jaise aapka sir Kashmiri green chilli powder hai, iska jo hai photos jo hai aur baki iske andar jo aur cheeze jo likhni hoti hai sir, jaise main bata raha hu aapko jaise yeh Kashmiri chilli powder jo hai sir kisi brand ka hoga sir aapke paas Everest jaise MDH ya fir MDR kisi ka hai ki aapka self hai?

Customer: Nahi hamara self hai.

Executive: Self hai? Theek hai sir. Local kya kya company ka naam hai sir? Jiska matlab kuch to hoga na jaise yaha pe main self likh du?

Customer: Nahi hum log hi banate hai woh to raw material laake hi banate hai.

Executive: Achha to main yaha self likh deta hu aapka hi hai matlab own likh deta hu self nahi own hota hai na? Aapka apna khud ka hai. Theek hai isme packaging size kya rahega sir?

Customer: Haan? According to order? Isme bhi packaging size according to order rahega? According to order.

Customer: Haan haan haan.

Executive: Theek hai aur purity. Yeh theek hai. Theek hai maine isme yeh bhar diya sir. Ek cheez aur ek cheez puchna tha sir to aap ispe buylead jo hai sir buylead consume karna start kariye sir. Sir aap kya aur kaun kaun se area pe deal karna chahte hain? Jaise all over India pe deal karenge ya fir apne Gujarat mein hi sabse zyada?

Customer: All over India.

Executive: All over India. Sir pehle na Gujarat ki bhi bahut saari buylead aapme aa rakhi hai business use ke liye bhi aa rakhi hai dehydrated red onion, onion ki aa rakhi hai yeh isme 20 kg iska packaging size unka hai quality bhi bahut zyada dikh raha hai lekin yaha pe packaging size jo hai 20 kg ka hai business use ke liye buylead hai sir aur yeh bahut matlab regular basis pe mangte rehte hain IndiaMART se yeh. To ek baar ispe coordinate kar lijiyega sir. Call sir aapke aapke paas IndiaMART login hai na sir aapke mobile mein?

Customer: Haan hai.

Executive: To IndiaMART ke app mein login hai to sir login haan sir login hai na to sir uspe ek baar call ek baar uspe dekhiye sir do teen buyleads aa rakhi hai unpe sir at least baat to kariye sir.

Executive: Kya hai na buylead jo dekh rahe hain sir uspe agar aap baat karoge to pata chalega na ab jaise aap bol rahe ho all over India pe dehydrated red onion flakes karke ek aa rakhi hai buylead 15 kg ki aa rakhi hai business use ke liye. Aap usse baat karoge to pata chalega fried onion ki bhi aa rakhi hai Ghaziabad Uttar Pradesh ki aa rakhi hai sir buylead. Buylead se IndiaMART se bhari padi hai aapko bas consume karna hai sir. Jaise kya hai na aap keh rahe ho na mere ko business nahi aa raha yeh cheeze hain. Uske liye sir to apna business use bhi karna padega na jaise kal maine aapko bataya tha. To abhi na aap na ek kaam karo abhi aap agar agar possible hai to sir abhi aap IndiaMART ka app open kar sakte hain?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: App open kariye sir dekhiye do teen buylead dikhegi aapko abhi mere ko speaker pe kar dijiye aur IndiaMART ka app open kariye.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haan ji sir abhi IndiaMART ka app open karenge to dekhiye dikh raha hoga aapko bahut saari buylead sir recent mein jaake buylead dekhiyega. Recent jo buylead ka section hai uspe uspe recent mein dikhega upar dikh raha hoga upar search ke niche just likha hoga relevant recent karke location ke upar hai.

Customer: Recent.

Executive: Haan recent recent pe click kariye. Recent pe click kar lijiye fir waha pe filter filter bhi laga sakte hain aur without filter bhi aap dekh sakte hain. Agar filter laga denge to filter mein jaake na sir all over India kar dijiye.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: All over India kar denge to all over India pe pehli Indore Madhya Pradesh ki buylead aa rakhi hai sir 14 minute hue hai isko dehydrated red onion ki buylead aa rakhi hai aapko. Hai na? Uske niche dekhenge fried onion ki aa rakhi hai to yeh sab buylead agar aap dekh rahe hain to sir usse consume kariye sir. Abhi jaise aapne dekha hai na to usko at least contact buyer now pe click kar denge to kam se kam aap consume kar payenge usko. Usko consume kar lijiye sir taki better rahega kam se kam aap thode active to dikhenge.

Executive: Consume kiya sir aapne?

Customer: Kya?

Executive: Aapne usko matlab kharida ki nahi sir jaise uspe click karenge na contact buyer now uspe aapko consume ho jayega. Uspe click kar lijiye sir taki kam se kam dekhiye usme dekh lijiye aap kis mein aap deal karte hain unhi unhi product mein jaise aapka fried onion ka ek aa rakha hai sir Ghaziabad Uttar Pradesh ka aa rakha hai, theek hai? Yaha pe business use ke liye 65000 se leke 85000 tak ka uska order value hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Order value sir dekhoge na aap usme quality jo hai 50 kg ka likha hua hai packaging size 20 kg, 40 kg aur 1 kg ka aa raha hai.

Executive: Dikh pa raha hai na sir ab uspe dekh lijiye uspe dekh lijiye contact buyer now taki aapko yaad rahega na warna fir yeh gayab ho jayega 16, 16 minute hua hai kisi ne dekha nahi hoga sir aap aap contact karoge to aap pehle contacted hoge to ho sakta hai ki yaha se deal final ho jaye. Jitni bhi jaldi buylead aa rahe the jaise dekhiye ek ghante se pehle ki hai ab ispe ho sakta hai bahut kam log consume kiye ho ab niche bhi aap dekhenge to bahut saari aisi buylead hai jo abhi abhi unko aaye hue hai zyada time hua nahi hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Hai na? To uspe aap baat kar sakte hain aisa karke sir dekh lijiye bahut saari aisi buyleads hai thoda niche ki taraf scroll bhi karenge na to aapko achhi achhi khasi buyleads dikh rahi hai onion powder ki bhi ek buylead aa rakhi hai sir GST verified banda hai thoda niche ki taraf scroll karenge New Delhi ka hai aap all over India pe deal karna chahte hain na to New Delhi mein bhi yaha pe bhi ek buylead aa rakhi hai sir.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai.

Executive: Inko dekh lijiye sir at least consume kar lijiye dekhiye sir dekhna alag cheez hota hai consume karna alag cheez hota hai abhi aap dekh rahe hain usko na contact buyer now pe click karenge na to kam se kam dekhiye aap baat mat kijiye bhale aap baad mein baat kijiyega aapke upar depend karta hai lekin kam se kam unki jo unki jo matlab unka jo number hai woh aapke paas aa jayega to aap abhi nahi to baad mein usse baat kar sakte ho sir aisa aap kar sakte ho. Hai na? Yeh cheez hai na sir to aapne at least kam se kam usko consume kar lijiye taki kam se kam aapko woh baad mein bhi aapke lead manager pe jaake aap dekh sake ki woh saari cheeze waha pe hain jaise lead manager pe aap jayenge to aapko dikh jayega sir Gujarat ki bhi ek buylead aa rakhi hai business use ke liye sir.

Executive: Bhavnagar ki hai sir.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Hai na? Aap usko bhi dekh lo sir jaise sir main main na aapko bata raha hu abhi itni saari buylead padi hui hai sir aap keh rahe the na mere ko business nahi mil raha yeh sab buylead hai aap dekho sir yeh hoga na ki itni sir jab aap consume karenge to jaise jaise apni dukaan pe nahi sir 100 log jo aate hain zaroori nahi hai 100 ke 100 kharidte hain usme se sirf teen ya char ya fir paanch jo hote hain woh paise tak aate hain baad baki uske pehle wale jitne rehte hain woh aise hi chale jaate hain right?

Executive: Aisa hota hai na sir jaise agar 100 log hamare paas aa rahe hain to sab sab to kharidte nahi hai usme se kuch hi log kharidte hain baki sab to aise hi bas aate hain daam pata karke chale jaate hain woh cheez in yaha pe online mein bhi wohi hai sir online mein jab aap consume karenge na inquiry jo aayengi usme bhi aisa aapko milega saamne se ki yeh main to bas amount check karne aaya tha but aur kuch log bolenge ki main to bas aise hi inquiry maine generate ki thi mujhe dekhna tha ki kya price hai kya value hai aisa karke. Aisi cheeze hongi sir. To aisi cheeze aati rahengi sir to dekhiye online mein sir challenges aayengi lekin usme aisa na sochiyega ki fir mere ko business nahi mil raha to main band kar du ya fir aisa karke, theek hai sir? Aapko thoda consistently aapko thoda dhyaan dena padega IndiaMART ki services pe. Hello sir aapko meri aawaz aa rahi hai?

Customer: Haan aa rahi hai aa rahi hai.

Executive: Haan ji sir to yeh cheeze dekh lijiye dekhiye abhi maine aapko IndiaMART open karwaya to aap kai cheeze dekh pa rahe hoge ki pehle bhi bahut saari lead manager pe aapko aapko inquiries aa rakhi hain saamne se logo ne aapko chat pe kar rakha hai aapne bahut time se band kar rakha hai IndiaMART kareeban teen mahine se hai na sir? To abhi jitni bhi purani chats hai aap woh bhi dekh rahe hoge to aapko lag raha hoga kahi na kahi kuch na kuch cheeze miss hui hai aap abhi nahi samajh pa rahe ho but sir wohi cheez aap dekhoge to aapko samajh mein aayega sir.

Customer: Theek hai chalo main karta hu haan.

Executive: Haan isko consume kariye sir main fir kal coordinate karta hu aapko, theek hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough business.

- Customer has not been using IndiaMART actively.



Resolution:

- Executive updated customer's SCS profile.

- Executive guided customer on using buyleads.

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads.

- Executive explained benefits of using buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, business, profile, catalog
